home.jobTitle: Full-stack developer, Content Creator and passionate about Computer Science.

about.title: About Me

text.one: I'm Filipe Santos, Frontend Developer, Content Creator and passionate about Computer Science. I have 3 different certifications in FrontEnd/React and completing a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering from Unijorge. I love creating simple solutions to complex problems. Because of this I work with development of Frontend, Mobile or Backend services.
text.two: As a software engineer with over 2 years of experience, I have a strong background in React and TypeScript following the best practices like SOLID and Clean Architecture to ensure that my code is well-organized and easy to understand.

about.letsWork: Let's work togheter to create the future. My Skills:

listTopics.one: Fullstack developer with stronger frontend skills
listTopics.two: Experience with React and recent experience with Next
listTopics.three: 1 Year of experience with Vue 3, Quasar and others Vue Framerworks(like Pinia)
listTopics.four: Strong knowledge of Javascript and TypeScript
listTopics.five: Knowledge about Tests(Jest, Vitest and TDD)
listTopics.eight: Knowledge about Node.js and somes databases(Mongodb and MySQL)
listTopics.none: 6 months of experience with React Native
